entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 11:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h except 60 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 near midnight then becoming northwest 20. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
